indian.details: Visa Exemption (Temporary policy until end 2024). Else Visa on Arrival (2000 THB).

activities.title: Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn)
activities.description: Iconic riverside temple with stunning porcelain spires. Best reached by river boat.

activities.title: Jay Fai Street Food
activities.description: Michelin-starred crab omelet. Long queues but world-famous street food experience.

activities.title: IconSiam Mall
activities.description: Massive riverside mall with an indoor floating market (SookSiam). Great for AC and food.

activities.title: Khao San Road
activities.description: The backpacker capital of the world. Bars, street massage, and loud music.

activities.title: Miracle Lounge (Concourse D)
activities.description: 24/7 Airside lounge. Showers, hot food, and alcohol. Accepts Priority Pass.

activities.title: Airport Thai Massage
activities.description: Express Thai massage stations located throughout the terminal.

activities.title: Chatuchak Weekend Market
activities.description: Huge open-air market. Only open Sat-Sun. Good for clothes and souvenirs.

activities.title: Grand Palace
activities.description: Spectacular palace complex. Strict dress code (no shorts).
